#summary Steps to build v0.5 of Tamil TTS
#labels Phase-Implementation

= Introduction =

Instructions to download and build Tamil TTS 


= Details =

In order to build the Tamil TTS on your system follow the instructions as given below:
  * Checkout the source code from http://code.google.com/p/text-to-speech/source/browse/#svn/branches/0.5/Thirukkural
  * Downlaod the speech database from http://ragashri.ee.iisc.ernet.in/tts/
  * Unzip the database to the Thirukkural directory where the workspace of TTS is present.
  * Open the workspace vak.dsw and build the program.
